title: Home for Purim
description: In the 1940s south, the Pischer family gathers to celebrate Purim. Young Rachel, worried about her dying mother, is nervous to introduce her girlfriend to the family. Originally released as Home for Thanksgiving.
quote: I didn’t wanna be in a kitchen with the brisket or the fish balls or the kreplach or the kugel.
alt1: Victor Allan Miller as Mr. Pischer
alt3: the Pischer matriarch ill in bed
alt4: Brian Chubb as Rachel’s brother, playing guitar at the dinner table
